name: Willi Krakau
introduction: Willi Krakau (born 4 December 1911 and died 26 April 1995) was a German racing driver who competed in a variety of formulae during the 1940s and 1950s, including Formula Two. He entered into the 1952 German Grand Prix in a privately entered AFM car, but did not start the race despite qualifying 28th on the grid.
